api/index.html.title: PLACEHOLDER | csharpjourney
api/index.html.keywords: PLACEHOLDER TODO: Add .NET projects to the src folder and run docfx to generate REAL API Documentation!

articles/account.html.title: Account | csharpjourney
articles/account.html.keywords: Account Endpoints related to authentication and user administration Account schema Key Type Description userName string User name email string The user's email password string The user's password role int The user's role [POST] Register a user Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/auth/register Body { "userName": "string", "email": "string", "name": "string", "password": "string", "role": 0 } Response: 200 Success [POST] Login a user Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/auth/login Body { { "userName": "string", "password": "string" } } Response: 200 Success [POST] Logout Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/auth/logOUT Response: 200 Success

articles/characters.html.title: Characters | csharpjourney
articles/characters.html.keywords: Characters Disney characters such as Mickey Mouse, Donald Duck, and so on. Character schema Key Type Description id uuid The id of the character. name string The name of the character. age int The age of the character. weight float The weight of the character story string The story of the character imageUrl string Link to the character's image moviesOrSeries array The movies or series related to the character Route Parameters Key Type Description characterId uuid The id of the character movieId uuid The id of the movie Query Parameters Key Type Description PageNumber int Pagination PageSize int Pagination Age int Filter by the age of the character Weight float Filter by the weight of the character MoviesOrSeries string Filter by the movie or series Name string Search by name [GET] All characters Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters Response: { "id": "10a94ce1-ff3d-472c-a08d-eeaf8ac55d0b", "name": "Mickey Mouse", "imageUrl": "https://example.com/mickey-mouse.jpg" }. { "id": "25f94e5b-7aa0-415a-9d3d-34edb85e3277", "name": "Minnie Mouse", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/mickey.png" } [GET] A single character Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters/{characterId} Response: { "id": "ea9009f7-9c59-4944-81da-48ee5a773124", "name": "Mickey Mouse", "age": 92, "weight": 23.5, "story": "Mickey Mouse is the iconic and beloved character in Disney's cartoons.", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/minnie.png", "moviesOrSeries": [ { "id": "45e04d11-dd27-4b45-904b-ca527f7de124", "title": "Fantasia", "creationDate": "1940-11-13", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/fantasia.jpg", "genre": { "name": "Fantasy" } }, { "id": "ae471f1b-8d60-4489-8519-23b854237d0d", "title": "Steamboat Willie", "creationDate": "1928-11-18", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/Steamboat-Willie.jpg", "genre": { "name": "Animation" } } ] } [POST] A single character Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters Body { "name": "Goofy", "age": 23, "weight": 32.1, "story": "Goofy is a cartoon character created by The Walt Disney Company", "imageUrl": "some url" } Response: { "id": "87119af1-1ef2-4ff6-ab9e-d21fcff22d94", "name": "Goofy", "age": 23, "weight": 32.1, "story": "Goofy is a cartoon character created by The Walt Disney Company", "imageUrl": "some url" } [POST] Assign a movie to a character Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters/{characterId}/movies/{MovieId} Response: 200 Ok [DELETE] A character Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters/{characterId} Response: 204 No Content [PUT] A character Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters/{characterId} Note "null" values will keep the already existing values Body { "Name": "Pluto modified", "Age": 10, "Weight": 22.6, "Story": null, "ImageUrl": null } Response: 204 No Content

articles/intro.html.title: Introduction | csharpjourney
articles/intro.html.keywords: Introduction Disney API is my first personal project where I group all my knowledge to build it. Here you'll find all the information to implement it in your personal proyects. Swagger Features of the API All CRUD Operations Filtering and Serching Pagination Authentication with JWT Sign-in and Log-in Images of Disney characters And more Database Diagram As you can see, I have implemented four tables, with three of them being the main tables and the fourth acting as a junction table. The relations are as follows: A character can appear in many movies or series, and a movie or series can feature many characters. A movie or series can belong to just one genre, and a genre can include many movies or series. Note I'm working on improving this API and its documentation, please send me an email to larico1599@gmail.com if you find an error.

articles/movies.html.title: Movies | csharpjourney
articles/movies.html.keywords: Movies Disney movies or series Movies schema Key Type Description id uuid The id of the movie. title string The title of the movie. creationDate datetime The date of the movie's creation. imageUrl string Link to the movies's image Route Parameters Key Type Description movieId uuid The id of the movie [GET] All movies Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/movies Response: [ { "id": "63419692-82fc-48cd-afc1-00a606333d64", "title": "Steamboat Willie", "creationDate": "1928-11-18", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/images/movies/Steamboat-Willie.jpg" }, { "id": "7395a228-076b-4e07-8f8a-33806ce01dd3", "title": "The Wise Little Hen", "creationDate": "1934-06-09", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/images/movies/The-Wise-Little-Hen.jpg" } ] [GET] A single movie Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/characters/{movieId} Response: { "id": "e80ad408-9e10-4a7e-bcc4-d4bdfde76e7b", "title": "Fantasia", "creationDate": "1940-11-13", "rating": 7, "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/images/movies/fantasia.jpg", "characters": [ { "id": "25fc6070-26bd-4af5-8f7e-47594131aed4", "name": "Mickey Mouse", "age": 90, "weight": 23.6, "story": "Mickey Mouse is a cartoon character created by Walt Disney.", "imageUrl": "https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/images/characters/mickey.png" } ], "genre": { "name": "Fantasy" } } [POST] A movie Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/movies Body { "title": "Some movie", "creationDate": "1934-06-09", "rating": 6, "imageUrl": "some url", "GenreId" : "The guid of the genre" } Response: { "id": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6", "name": "string", "age": 0, "weight": 0, "story": "string", "imageUrl": "string", "moviesOrSeries": [ { "id": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6", "title": "string", "creationDate": "2023-07-17T02:07:29.786Z", "imageUrl": "string", "genre": { "name": "string", "imageUrl": "string" } } ] } [DELETE] A movie Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/movies/{characterId} Response: Success [PUT] A movie Request: https://disney-api.app.csharpjourney.com/api/movies/{characterId} Note "null" values will keep the already existing values Body { "title": "Aladdin modified", "rating": 20, "imageUrl": "null", "creationDate": "null" } Response: Success
